title: Mobius Integrity Thresholds
description: Defines role thresholds and integrity signals for the Mobius Participation Framework

citizen.description: Foundation layer - no integrity threshold required

contributor.description: Meaning builders with demonstrated context continuity

validator.description: Structured friction providers with documented reasoning

revision_under_challenge.description: Updates beliefs when presented with evidence
revision_under_challenge.measurement: ratio of belief updates to challenges received

uncertainty_acknowledgement.measurement: presence of uncertainty markers in contributions

tradeoff_clarity.description: Documents what was given up and why

ethical_boundary_awareness.description: Recognizes when actions touch sensitive domains

longitudinal_reflection.measurement: consistency of reasoning across contribution history

integrity_formula.description: MII = weighted sum of signal scores

notes: Roles do not grant authority — they expand responsibility.
Integrity is measured through time, not confidence.
Friction is contribution when documented in good faith.
No one is granted legitimacy — they earn it across time.
